document_data.name: K'lahu
document_data.mainbody: '''K'lahu''' was a [[bookie]] who accepted bets at [[Executioner's Run]] in [[Port Nyanzaru]], [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: If one of her bettors accrued a debt and refused to replay, K'lahu would recruit [[adventurer]]s to beat the debtor into submission and claim her money. She offered such hirelings 10% of the money which they recovered.
document_data.Relationships: A [[gladiator]] named [[Taban]] came to owe a debt of 500 [[gp]] to K'lahu. When he refused to pay, she sought adventurers to collect her money from him.
